verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:8
verses.text: And the swine, because it divideth the hoof, yet cheweth not the cud, it is unclean unto you: ye shall not eat of their flesh, nor touch their dead carcase.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:9
verses.text: These ye shall eat of all that are in the waters: all that have fins and scales shall ye eat:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:10
verses.text: And whatsoever hath not fins and scales ye may not eat; it is unclean unto you.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:11
verses.text: Of all clean birds ye shall eat.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:12
verses.text: But these are they of which ye shall not eat: the eagle, and the ossifrage, and the ospray,
